Articles.Content: So for awhile now I've seen videos where there is additional info at the top of the screen such as (Apoapsis height, time to APO, periapsis height,  time to peri, and vertical/horizontal speed.) I think there is more but not sure. Is that info available on Xbox one? If so how to I go about turning it on? I have the DLC is that helps too.

Welcome to the forum @F-1'69.

I believe what you are seeing is the information displays that come with the mod Kerbal Engineer Redux. Unfortunately there is no way to add it to console versions but much of the information has now been added to the PC vanilla game and I hope will soon be added to console versions.
